is_ebs_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for ebs is enabled

is_ec2_mssql_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for ec2_mssql is enabled

is_protect_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for ebs is enabled

is_rds_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for rds is enabled

is_s3_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for S3 is enabled

is_warmtier_dynamodb_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for warmtier dynamodb is enabled

is_warmtier_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect for warmtier is enabled

role_external_id.description: A key that must be used by Clumio to assume the service role in your account. This should be a secure string, like a password, but it does not need to be remembered (random characters are best).

wait_time_before_create.description: Time in seconds to wait before creation of resources. This will be required to be set to a value above 45s in the case of shifting from old terraform template to the module based template.
